Snap an image of a newspaper or choose an already existing photo of a newspaper, receipt, or anything with text on it to make it instantly readable.

Newshound is your everyday pocket assistant. You can capture or load text-based images and Newshound will intelligently extract the text based on OCR technology. Once extracted, you can then instruct Newshound to read it out to you. All your older recording are stored safely on your device.
